title: PES University BTech admission: Do they need KCET rnk or just scores?
content: I wanted to know whether if pesu uses it kcet rnks to create a merit list or they just use raw kcet scores…please help much appreciated

comments.body: I think raw kcet scores ranks are not considered
Kcet admissions are handled by kea based on seat availability and candidate preferences, not by PES internally.
Nah this year I’m talking pes has it’s own counselling cuz no pessat so they’ll create their merit list
I don't think so they have to comply to the KEA
no not the kcet counselling this year 45% of the seats is for jee main /kcet quota based on kcet and jee main scores
Then they will consider rank i guess .
Nah they asked individual cet marks and then rank
Wait pes released kcet merit list as well? I thought they only released jee one??
So like how we had counselling for jee today, we'll have one for kcet too? not through the kea counselling and stuff?
Please don’t register for that also

They aren't going to consider your biology marks for engineering college. Are they ? Your engineering rank depicts the marks you scored in pcm so what's the difference if they consider pcm marks or engineering rank?
isn't kcet fees way lesser than mains one tho
Nah it’s the same fee go actually see the application form
Uh no? The ceo person giving speech today himself said that if we get seat through kcet they'll refund the money?
